name: MTLInstanceAccelerationStructureDescriptor
desc: A description of an acceleration structure that derives from instances of primitive acceleration structures.

items.name: var instanceDescriptorType: MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType
items.desc: The format of the instance data in the descriptor buffer.

items.name: var instancedAccelerationStructures: [MTLAccelerationStructure]?
items.desc: The bottom-level acceleration structures that instances use in the instance acceleration structure .

items.name: enum MTLAccelerationStructureInstanceDescriptorType
items.desc: Options for specifying different kinds of instance types.

items.name: var instanceCount: Int
items.desc: The number of instances in the instance descriptor buffer.

items.name: var instanceDescriptorBuffer: MTLBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer that contains descriptions of each instance in the acceleration structure.

items.name: var instanceDescriptorBufferOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, to the descripton of the first instance.

items.name: var instanceDescriptorStride: Int
items.desc: The stride, in bytes, between instance descriptions.

items.name: var motionTransformCount: Int
items.desc: The number of motion transforms in the motion transform buffer.

items.name: var motionTransformBuffer: MTLBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer that contains descriptions of each motion transform in the acceleration structure.

items.name: var motionTransformBufferOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, to the descripton of the first motion transform.
